name: Sword Art Shooter
description:
Sword Art shooter is a 2D retro action game inspired in space invaders. The game is about one knight fighting against night monsters.

How to play:

  • A: move left
  • D:move right
  • A/D+space: dash
  • Mouse and left button: shoot swords.

Game made by Game maker Studio 2

Made by David Llobell and Adrià Jalón (@Ad0rian in twitter)
